name: Design claim conciliation panel hearing; persons attending
text:
[§672B-8]  Design claim conciliation panel hearing; persons attending.  Unless excluded or excused by the panel, the following persons shall attend hearings before the panel:
     (1)  The party or parties making the claim;
     (2)  The design professional against whom the claim is made or representatives thereof, other than counsel, authorized to act for the design professional; or
     (3)  Counsel for the parties, if any. [L 2007, c 207, pt of §2]
 
Revision Note
 
  In paragraph (2), the semicolon after "thereof" changed to a comma pursuant to §23G-15.
